channel.title: Elements on Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Elements on Hugo Site

item.title: Set-up
item.description: hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke Change config toml: baseURL = "https://example.org/" languageCode = "en-us" title = "My New Hugo Site" theme = "ananke"

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: elements
item.description: Table of contents Table of contents Text Code Python C/C++ Bash Tables Text Some example text Code Python def foo(): print ("This is a python function") C/C++ void foo(){ prinf("%s\n", "This is a C function") } Bash # This is a bash command cd dir && echo $PWD; # Return exit 0; Tables Pages Elements 1 Text 2 Code 3 Tables
